title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4063.6 - Horses not to be claimed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4063.6 - Horses not to be claimed

State Regulations

In all cases of races with claiming conditions in which
horses may be entered or may run not to be claimed, only such horses as run to
be claimed shall be liable to be claimed, and with this exception, the
foregoing sections of this Part relating to claiming races shall
apply. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4063.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
